projects.title: Cellora - Dashboard Builder Platform
projects.description: Cellora is a no-code dashboard builder platform that enables users to create interactive and customizable dashboards by connecting to various data sources, visualizing data through drag-and-drop components, and sharing insights with team members.

projects.title: CodeCollab - A Real-time Code Collaboration Platform
projects.description: CodeCollab is a real-time code collaboration platform that allows developers to work together on coding projects seamlessly. It features live code editing, syntax highlighting, and integrated chat for effective communication.

projects.title: ScribbleScratch - Real-time Collaborative Drawing App
projects.description: ScribbleScratch is a web-based real-time collaborative drawing application that allows multiple users to create and edit drawings simultaneously on a shared workspace. It features various drawing tools, color options, and the ability to save and share artwork.

projects.title: BuildByOwn
projects.description: Create a stunning GitHub profile in minutes! ProfileX is a web app that helps you generate a customized README.md for your GitHub profile, showcasing your skills, experience, and projects.

projects.title: Video Conferencing
projects.description: Video conferencing app enabling real-time video and audio communication, screen sharing, and chat functionality for seamless virtual meetings and collaboration.

projects.title: SafeForSure
projects.description: A comprehensive Health Management System (HMS) designed to streamline healthcare operations, including patient records, appointment scheduling, billing, and reporting, enhancing efficiency and patient care.

projects.title: Developer Portfolio Website
projects.description: A customizable React.js portfolio template. Update data.json to personalize—no coding needed! Perfect for showcasing your work.

about.main: I’m Rohit, a budding full-stack web developer based in Rajasthan, India. Since my first coding adventure in 12th grade, I’ve been hooked on technology.
about.journey: B.Tech undergraduate, pursuing my degree from Engineering College, Ajmer. I blend design and development to craft innovative solutions.
about.passion: In recent years, I’ve dived into coding, building robust front-end stacks and tackling real-world challenges. I’m passionate about making a difference through technology.
about.connect: Explore my portfolio and let’s connect for collaborations!
